value.fullName: Continuation of the child in the child's home is not contrary to the child's welfare

value.fullName: Due to emergency nature of the situation, reasonable efforts could not be made
value.label: Due to emergency nature of the situation, reasonable efforts could not be made

value.fullName: Reasonable efforts were made to prevent removal
value.label: Reasonable efforts were made to prevent removal

value.fullName: Reasonable efforts were not made to prevent removal
value.label: Reasonable efforts were not made to prevent removal

value.fullName: Reasonable efforts were made to finalize the child's permanency plan

value.fullName: Reasonable efforts were not made to finalize the child's permanency plan

value.fullName: Permanency plan of reunification may be changed to another permanency plan
value.label: Permanency plan of reunification may be changed to another permanency plan

value.fullName: Voluntary placement is in the best interest of the child
value.label: Voluntary placement is in the best interest of the child

value.fullName: Voluntary placement is not in the best interest of the child
value.label: Voluntary placement is not in the best interest of the child

value.fullName: Reasonable efforts were unable to be determined
value.label: Reasonable efforts were unable to be determined

value.fullName: Court order specifies who the child was physically and/or legally removed from and the date the child last resided with the legal custodian
value.label: Court order specifies who the child was physically and/or legally removed from and the date the child last resided with the legal custodian
